maqras.text: 37|83|sillo geuleul ttaleuneun mulijung-e abeulaham-i iss-eossnola
37|84|geuga gyeong-geonha ma-eum-eulo ju kkelo wass-eul ttae
37|85|abeojiwa geuui baegseong-ege yeo leobun-i sungbaehaneun geos-i mueos-inyo
37|86|yeoleobun-i sungbaehaneun geugeos-eun hananim-i anin heowiui usang-i a nideonyo
37|87|man-yuui junim-e gwanhayeo yeoleo bun-eun eotteohge saenglahaneunyo
37|88|geuleon hu geuneun byeoldeul-eul chyeoda bogoseo
37|89|malhagil sillo nae ma-eum-i apeudoda
37|90|geuleoja salamdeul-i deung-eul dolli go tteonassdeola
37|91|geuhu geuga geudeul-ui sin-ege da gaga neohuineun neohui ap-e malyeondoen eum sig-eul meogji moshaneunyo
37|92|mal-eul haji anhneunde eotteon il-i iss-eossneunyo
37|93|geuleon hu geuneun dagaga oleun son-eulo geugeos-eul busuwo beolyeossdeola
37|94|geuhu usang sungbaejadeul-i geubhi seodulleo dallyeowa geuleul daehani
37|95|geuga malhagil yeoleobun-i mandeun usang-eul sungbaehandan mal-inyo
37|96|hananimkkeseo yeoleobun-eul changjohasyeossgo yeoleobun-i mandeun geosdo geuleoha dago hani
37|97|geudeul-i malhagil hwadeog-eul mandeul-eotaoleuneun bulsog-eulo geuleul deonjila
37|98|igeos-i silpaehani geudeul-eun da leun eummoleul kkumyeoss-euna hananim-eun geu deul-eul gajang bicheonhan jadeullo mandeul-eoss nola
37|99|geuga malhagil naui junimkkelo galini geubunkkeseo naleul indohayeo jusil geos-ila
37|100|juyeo jeoege sunjonghal jason-euljuobsoseo
37|101|geulihayeo hananim-eun innaeha myeo sunjonghal aiga iss-eul bog-eum-ui so sig-eul geuege jueossnola

37|102|adeul-ui naiga geuwa hamkke ilhal naie ileuleoss-eul ttae geuga malhagil nae adeul-a neoleul jedan-e eul lilaneun myeonglyeong-eul naega kkum-eseo boass nola neoui saeng-gag-i eotteonji algo sip guna lago hani adeul-i malhagil a beoji dangsinkkeseo myeonglyeongbad-eun daelo ha obsoseo hananimkkeseo innaehaneun jong-eu lobuteo wonhasindamyeon dangsinkkeseo jeoleul balgyeonhal geos-ibnida hayeossdeola
37|103|geu dul-iseo hananimkke sunjonghago geuneun geulo hayeogeum geuui ima leul sug-idolog haess-eul ttae
37|104|hananim-eun geuleul bulleo abeulaham-a
37|105|geudaeneun imi geu kkum-eul ihaeng hayeossnola hananim-eun ileohdeus seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-ege bosang-eul naelinila
37|106|sillo igeos-eun bunmyeonghan hanauisiheom-ieossnani
37|107|hananim-eun hullyunghan huisaeng-eulo geuleul daesinhayeossnola
37|108|hananim-eun geuege cheugbog-eul naelyeo hue ol sedaedeul-ui gieogsog-e nam ge haessnola
37|109|abeulaham-ege pyeong-an-i iss-eul geos-ila
37|110|ileohdeus hananim-eun seon-eul haenghaneun geudeul-ege bosang-eul naelinila
37|111|geuneun mid-eum-i ganghan hananim-uijongdeul jung-e iss-eossnola
37|112|hananim-eun geuege uiloun jajeung-e iss-eul han yeeonja isag-ui so sig-eul jueo
37|113|geuwa geuligo isag-ege chugbog-eul naelyeoss-euna geudeul-ui huson jung-ui mu lineun uiloum-eul haenghayeoss-eudoe daleun mulineun saaghan haeng-wileul haess-eossnola
37|114|dasi hananim-eun mosewa alon-ege eunhyeleul bepul-eossnola
37|115|hananim-eun geudeulgwa geudeul-ui baeg
37|116|geudeul-eul dowass-eumae geudeul-eun geujaeang-eul geugboghayeossgo
37|117|geudeul-ege sasil-eul balghyeo juneunseongseoleul jueoss-eumyeo
37|118|geudeul-eul olh-eun gillo indohan hu
37|119|geudeul-ege chugbog-eul naelyeo hue-ol sedaedeul-ui gieog sog-e namge hayeoss nola
37|120|mosewa alon-ege pyeong-an-i iss-eul geos-ila
37|121|hananim-eun geuwa gat-i hayeo seon-eul haenghaneun ideul-ege bosang-eul nae linola
37|122|sillo geudeul-eun mid-eum-i ganghan uli hananim-ui jongdeul jeung du jong-ieoss nola
37|123|elliyaseudo hananim-i bo naen seonjija jung han seonjijalo
37|124|geuga geuui baegseongdeul-ege neohuineun hananim-eul dulyeowo haji anhneunyo
37|125|ba-eullaleul sungbaehago gajang hullyunghan changjojuleul beolineunyo
37|126|hananim-eun neohui junim-isa jinagan seonjodeul-ui junim-i anideonyo lago malhayeoss-euna
37|127|geudeul-eun geuege geoyeoghayeoss-eu ni geudeul-eun bunmyeong bulliwo gass-eulila
37|128|geuleona seongsilhan hananim-ui jongdeul-eun geuleohji anihaessnola
37|129|hananim-eun geuege chugbog-eul naelyeo hue ol sedaedeul-ui gieogsog-e nam ge hayeossnola
37|130|illiyaseuwa gat-eun ideul-ege pyeong-an-i iss-eul geos-ila
37|131|ileohdeus hananim-eun seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-ege bosang-eul bepunila
37|132|sillo geuneun mid-eum-i ganghan ha nanim-ui jong jung-ui han jong-ieossnola
37|133|losdo hananim-i bonaen seonji ja jung han seonjijalo
37|134|hananim-eun geuwa geuligo geuuichujongja moduleul guhayeossnola
37|135|geuleona dwie nam-eun han neulg-eun yeoseong-eun je-oedoeeossnola
37|136|geuhu hananim-eun nameojido myeolmangke haessnani
37|137|sillo neohuiga achim-i doemae geudeul-ui sajeogjileul jinagassnola
37|138|jeonyeog-edo geuleohageoneul neohuineun ihaehaji moshaneunyo
37|139|yonado hananim-i bonaen seon jija jung han seonjijalo
37|140|geuneun han noyecheoleom gadeug sil-eun baelo dojuhayeo
37|141|jeomsul-eul deonjyeoss-euni geuga binan-eul bad-assdeola
37|142|geuttae keun gogiga geuleul samkyeo beolyeoss-euni ineun geuui binanbad-eul haeng wi ttaemun-ieossnola
37|143|hananimkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo lago geuga hoegaehaji anihaessdamyeon
37|144|geuneun bunmyeong geu mulgogi baes-sog e buhwal-ui geunalkkaji iss-eoss-eulila
